nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.othello

Class ContextAwareOthelloBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.othello.OthelloBoard
      • nz.ac.massey.cs.ig.games.othello.ContextAwareOthelloBoard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EasyOthelloBoard

    public class ContextAwareOthelloBoard
extends OthelloBoard
    OthelloBoard which is aware of the current player. This means it is aware of the current player (me) and the enemy.
    Author:
    Johannes Tandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextAwareOthelloBoard(java.lang.Object player1, java.lang.Object player2)
      Default Constructor which creates a board for OthelloBoard.player1 as player 1 and OthelloBoard.player2 as player 2 and a bord size of 8.
      ContextAwareOthelloBoard(java.lang.Object player1, java.lang.Object player2, int fieldSize)
      See #OthelloBoard(Object, Object) for more details.
      ContextAwareOthelloBoard(OthelloBoard sourceBoard)
      Creates a duplicate ContextAwareOthelloBoard of a given OthelloBoard.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getScoreOfEnemy()
      Returns score of opposite of current player
      int getScoreOfMe()
      Returns score of current player
      boolean isFieldEnemy(int x, int y)
      Returns true if the owner of field x y is not the current player and the field is not free
      boolean isFieldMine(int x, int y)
      Returns true if the owner of field x y is the current player
      boolean isMe(java.lang.Object bot)
      Returns true if parameter bot is current player
      void makeMove(int x, int y)
      Makes a move from the perspective of the current player See OthelloBoard.setField(int, int, Object) for more details.
      void setMe(java.lang.Object me)
      Sets the current player.
      void switchPlayerPerspective()
      Changes current player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextAwareOthelloBoard

        public ContextAwareOthelloBoard(java.lang.Object player1,
                                java.lang.Object player2,
                                int fieldSize)
        See #OthelloBoard(Object, Object) for more details. This creates a board with a specified board size OthelloBoard.fieldSize. Current or starting player is player 1
        Parameters:
        player1 - Principal for Player I
        player2 - Principal for Player II
        fieldSize - size of axis

      • ContextAwareOthelloBoard

        public ContextAwareOthelloBoard(java.lang.Object player1,
                                java.lang.Object player2)
        Default Constructor which creates a board for OthelloBoard.player1 as player 1 and OthelloBoard.player2 as player 2 and a bord size of 8. Current or starting player is player 1
        Parameters:
        player1 - Principal for Player I
        player2 - Principal for Player II

      • ContextAwareOthelloBoard

        public ContextAwareOthelloBoard(OthelloBoard sourceBoard)
        Creates a duplicate ContextAwareOthelloBoard of a given OthelloBoard. If sourceBoard is ContextAwareOthelloBoard too, then current player is copied as well.
        Parameters:
        sourceBoard - OthelloBoard which should be duplicated.

    • Method Detail

      • switchPlayerPerspective

        public void switchPlayerPerspective()
        Changes current player.

      • setMe

        public void setMe(java.lang.Object me)
        Sets the current player. Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if parameter me is not player1 or player2
        Parameters:
        me - new current player

      • isFieldMine

        public boolean isFieldMine(int x,
                           int y)
        Returns true if the owner of field x y is the current player
        Parameters:
        x - x position
        y - y position
        Returns:
        true if the owner of field x y is the current player

      • isFieldEnemy

        public boolean isFieldEnemy(int x,
                            int y)
        Returns true if the owner of field x y is not the current player and the field is not free
        Parameters:
        x - x position
        y - y position
        Returns:
        true if the owner of field x y is not the current player and the field is not free

      • isMe

        public boolean isMe(java.lang.Object bot)
        Returns true if parameter bot is current player
        Parameters:
        bot - principal of player to compare
        Returns:
        true if parameter bot is current player

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(int x,
                     int y)
        Makes a move from the perspective of the current player See OthelloBoard.setField(int, int, Object) for more details. ATTENTION: Does not automatically switch player perspective!!
        Parameters:
        x - x position
        y - y position
